mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman Addressed to Tudor Hall but Crossed Out
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, October 18, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman, addressed to Tudor Hall but crossed out, from Henry Lane at Camp on Big Sewill. Subject: Mr. Lane’s experiences thus far in the army and states “so far I have never met the enemy in battle.” 1 original piece and 4 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
